item.title: Similarities between Domain Driven Design & Object Oriented Programming
item.description: At the Alt.NET UK Conference which I attended over the weekend it occurred to me while listening to some of the discussions on Domain Driven Design that a lot of the ideas in DDD are actually very similar to those being practiced in Object Oriented Programming and related best practices. The similarities Anaemic Domain Model/Law of Demeter There was quite a bit of discussion in the session about anaemic domain models.
